## General overview data collected on of atmospheric concentrations from: Belo Horizonte, Rio de Janeiro,Sao Paulo, and Grande Victoria. All cities have a BRT system (and has held at least one sports mega-event in the last decade) implemented except for Grande Victoria. It is important to note that Curitiba's is the first BRT system ever completed in 1978.

#### Data sources

    ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
